name: History Repeats
description:
After being sealed away for decades, it's up to the legendary robot to remove the evil creator's clutch on the world.  But, his robot brothers see him as a rebel, and will stop at nothing to take him out. Are you brave enough to stop them and save the world?

* Control the robot, Delta, as you uncover his past, and create a new future.

* Explore unique environments,  brimming with secrets!

* Battle against weird, and tough enemies!

* Add three amusing characters to your party, each with unique abilities!

* Discover multiple secret sidequests!
